text:
HAPPY SUNDAY!
Tune into @WTNH from 6-8am to hear how the state is handling the #COVID19 #vaccine shortage.  And there's a new federal #mask mandate from @CDCgov.  Find out where masks are absolutely required.  And, snow is on the way!  @Ash_Baylor has the details! Join us. ❄️❄️ https://t.co/t1nonrEjUr
